nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Office of Budget and Statistics

biogHist.p: As the Office of Institutional Research and Planning (1969-1987), formed by amalgamating the functions and duties of several data-collecting offices, this unit provided statistical information to the University's administrators and to client-researchers on staff, students, courses, facilities and finance. Analysts developed databases, conducted or assisted research projects and prepared the annual statistical Data Book. In 1987, the offices and functions of Budget Planning and Institutional Research and Planning were merged into the office of Budget and Statistics. Directors: 1969-1977 William A. Preshing; 1977-1978 Gordon L. Mowat (Acting); 1978-[1987] Edward A. Holdaway; 1987 Richard N. Spilsted; 1988-1991 Peter A. Watts.
